title: Did President Trump Share a Photo of a ‘Bikers for Trump’ Member with a Nazi Tattoo?
subtitle: President Trump may have greeted the 'Bikers for Trump' at one of his golf courses, but he didn't tweet a photograph of one of them bearing an 'SS' tattoo.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: President Trump shared an image of a "Bikers for Trump" member with Nazi tattoos, one of those who visited him at his golf club in Bedminister.
